website_summaries.verdict: The best marine light to buy for the most visibility while driving a boat at night.
pros: Large bulb is easily seen from long distances out on lakes and open water
Pole is 12" tall for better visibility and folds down for storage when not in use
cons: Bulb casing can start to decay if left outside and exposed to UV light for long periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Light is great, look at my photos and read my review
customer_reviews.text: I read a few reviews on here before buying, most negative feedback was due to the item being weak plastic/breaking etc. Pros: Inexpensive Versatile Works with led retrofit bulbs to save battery-P Aluminum shaft with rivets ABS plastic base w/ bar bracket. Light diffuser/shroud, keeps bulb safe Hardware included Cons: None- it was so cheap it's a no brainier. Overview I've been using the product for a more aggressive application, causing the light to take more abuse then any standard intended purpose and I've had Zero issues with either light fixture ( I purchased two ) I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Battle Born

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Received it in the mail on time and wasn’t a long wait either. Light isn’t that big but does exactly what it’s supposed to. It’s pretty bright, you can see it from a good distance which is what I was looking for since we go night fishing a lot and cruising.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Medium Quality = OK for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my last one which lasted 2 yrs. I need the fold down feature when fishing. Lens will decay in UV Sunlight and shatter. Mine is docked 8 months a year and exposed 8-13 hrs a day.
customer_reviews.author: Wire up the world

customer_reviews.title: Works fine on pontoon Bimini top
customer_reviews.text: Installed with no is sues. Of course holes did not line up but that is what drills are for
customer_reviews.author: Lake Stl Clay

customer_reviews.title: Boat light
customer_reviews.text: A little shorter than I anticipated but actually it worked out for the better. It is so short it does not interfere with casting and landing of fish. It is very bright also.
customer_reviews.author: DaveH

customer_reviews.title: Good Replacement
customer_reviews.text: My rear running light was damaged on my Bimini top. I don't do much night boating, but you still need to be legal, just in case. I bought this as a replacement, and it worked fine. Compared to the $40-50 my local marine wanted for a new light/post, I feel I got off great. It does the trick and I was able to install with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: KN4TX

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice light....used to replace the broken one on my pontoon bimini
customer_reviews.author: dls322

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my boat
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my boat because of the fold down application. Out of the way when not in use and provides enough light to tie lures on at night! Perfect for my needs. Mounts and installed easily. Well made and I'm sure will last many years to come. Highly recommended and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: PTB

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Like many reviews on here, after installation light didnt work at all. Wiring was good, couldnt get it to come on. Bought a different, better but cheaper one and it worked fine without changing anything else. Save your money and buy something different.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: kind of disappointed that the plactic to actually hold the light up ended up breaking. I ended up plastic welding it back together since i do have the materials. Really wish it would have came in led when i bought it. Halogen just uses more power and isnt nearly as bright
customer_reviews.author: special k

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for a small boat. Also like the fact you can fold it down when placing the cover on to prevent damage. Make very well and bright, a lot bang for so little money.
customer_reviews.author: Sir.Charles Franklin Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great light, replace bulb with 1142 LED bulb
customer_reviews.text: Light has done me good so far, it is not an LED but you can replacebit with an LED 1142 bulb from your local auto parts store. But even with the origional light bulb it only pulls one amp so it lasts forever
customer_reviews.author: Jacey Dudley

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok but leaves much to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: It the most durable light that’s for sure but it’s inexpensive. The bulbs for some reason like to blow after about 4-6 hours of use so you better have spare bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Janot

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: I remember back in the day when these things had to be 2ft tall and was always awarkward to use. This one is short, very well made, can fold it down when not in use and definitely bright. I will get years of use out of this!
customer_reviews.author: InfiniteReality

customer_reviews.title: Bad light
customer_reviews.text: Waited about 3 weeks to install turns out the bulb won't stay connected to terminal and stay on .... very disappointing. Unfortunately for me my return window expired.
customer_reviews.author: D'Angelo Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Light bulb was good, boat wiring was good, light never worked. I don't believe the bulb contacts lined up with the socket contacts. Going to buy another light but it won't be this one again.
customer_reviews.author: A. C. Emerman

customer_reviews.title: Weak attachment
customer_reviews.text: The piece at the bottom where the light swivels is very thin and weak plastic. Mine broke with very little resistance on it. Not very durable
customer_reviews.author: Andy Beare

customer_reviews.title: Base is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Plastic base is terrible, it broke moving the light to a different position just after new installation. Heavier base would go a long way
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Kersey

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: you cannot beat the price of this for the quality and usefulness. I believe that this one is the cheapest currently on Amazon. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mike g.

customer_reviews.title: Very poorley made, cheap tin and lousey plastic cover for the bulb. Spend a little more!
customer_reviews.text: Very poorley made, cheap tin and lousey plastic cover for the bulb. Spend a little more and get an LED light that is not so flimsy with a decent cover for the bulb. Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Amendola

customer_reviews.title: being seen
customer_reviews.text: this light on the back on my kayak is great, lets other boaters know i'm there very happy with it, I like that I can lay it all the way down when i'm not using it and it's out of the way
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT IT UP AND BE LEGAL!
customer_reviews.text: THIS LIGHT IS GREAT AND KEPT OUR BOAT LEGAL FOR NIGHT FISHING/BOAT RIDING. FOLDS DOWN FOR TRAVEL ON THE TRAILER.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Broken Tension Piece
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until the plastic broke on the tensioning part, now it's useless. 1 month out of return window too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sadler

customer_reviews.title: Lights up the night
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, just don't know why all of these have 3 mounting holes. Wish someone would have a 2 hole option
customer_reviews.author: YnotMe

customer_reviews.title: Nice light, Wish it cam with stainless steel screws, with to mount it
customer_reviews.text: NO stainless steel screws that came with the light, wish it was an LED light not a regular light bulb
customer_reviews.author: booboobear

customer_reviews.title: Simply Install
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to mount and wire up, at a great price. Just installed on boat about a month ago so not sure of how durable it is, but sure it'll last me for years.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Black

customer_reviews.title: Cheap yes good no.
customer_reviews.text: Bulb sockets floppy makes for a loose bulb to bounce around not good. Mount has ruff ratchet action like it'll brake.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Light very bright and perfect fit on top rail of Bimini top on my pontoon. Did arrive a couple days later than promised. That’s why I gave vendor a 3
customer_reviews.author: Dave N

customer_reviews.title: Decent for an inexpensive light.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install on my Jon boat. Really like that it folds down when not in use, but the cover over the light is pretty flimsy. I'll be replacing the bulb with an Led bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Baker

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit.
customer_reviews.text: Visible up to a mile. Forgot to raise it up once and it was in the water for a four hour sail, held up so its waterproof for sure. 5/7, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and wire up
customer_reviews.text: Another quality light in my opinion. Easy to install and wire up. I installed the light on an old aluminum boat that i am restoring. Folds down for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Donald H. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light for Small Boat
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bright light form my 14’ fishing boat. It’s well made.
customer_reviews.author: sinder

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I need to go under a low bridge to get from the marina to the lake. The fold down feature then the plug in I had that got "flaky" after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Tom from Round LAke

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great little light, put it on my jon boat, works great
customer_reviews.author: Papawheelie81

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is holding up strong. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Biminy light
customer_reviews.text: Nice item and easy to install. The lens is a bit flimsy On top.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Martin

customer_reviews.title: Boat light
customer_reviews.text: I like this light because I can fold it down out of the way. I put it on the back of my canoe and it does not interfere with the handle I use to transport .
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It works but the thing shorts out when I put it down/up and I need to wiggle it to get it on. Triple checked my wiring and it wasn’t my error.
customer_reviews.author: Alex N. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It worked great !!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and it worked great for what i used it for.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Love the foldable design we have lost multiple of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the foldable design we have lost multiple of the plug in style ones so this was the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: Great light for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have looked at many boat lights and to find one at this price and size sold me.
customer_reviews.author: kurt Watson

customer_reviews.title: User friendly package
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have to hurt myself to open the package. Hooray!!
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, good price, great quality for the moment
customer_reviews.text: I installed it in my boat, used it for days and nights in Magdalena river and at sea in Colombia: roughest conditions. Other boats told me that it is seen from a very long distance, and the light is strong and solid. Don`t know for how long it is going to work, but it already payed itself.
customer_reviews.author: J E C

customer_reviews.title: Light works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great LED light. Installed on pontoon boat to replace regular bulb light.
customer_reviews.author: To5m Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Light is great.  The plastic mount is not great
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying this light again because the base broke after a few months' use. The light is fine, but the plastic holder snapped at the threads after a few months. Couldn't be fixed with epoxy, so because the holes are already drilled for this base, I'm getting another one.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Longer wires would be helpful
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my rubber yacht. Works good. I added 1’ of wire and gator clips for easier connection. I would suggest the company leave longer wires coming out and have a small pack of typical terminal connectors to go with.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really convenient install, I used a marine grade on/off switch along with this.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Brightness is great.
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on 18hp Cowel for a jon boat. Perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: kristan salazar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install and I fully expect it will last for years
customer_reviews.author: Randy Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like it, affordable seems good quality, easy to mount and swings out of the way when necessary. We will see how it holds up over time, otherwise I can only give it 4 stars. Also when it finally gives out I will likely make the switch to LED.. incandescent is so "1940's"
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: Installed this light on my boat it works great it has a bright bulb in it and it was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Easy install but cover is weak.
customer_reviews.text: First time coming home from the Lake and the light cover fell off. Now I got an exposed bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a small or medium size boat
customer_reviews.text: Arrived super fast. Easy to install and fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: TripleR71

customer_reviews.title: Light appears to be well made and works as expected ...
customer_reviews.text: Light appears to be well made and works as expected. Only gave it 4 stars because the wires need to be at least another 3" longer.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Noe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item!
customer_reviews.text: Price, as well as shipping, were great! I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: crakerjacq

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one.l, they work great got an extra for more light.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The light illuminates my 16’ smokercraft Lodge perfectly! It ...
customer_reviews.text: The light illuminates my 16’ smokercraft Lodge perfectly! It would be 5 star if the ratcheting mechanism was improved, but still worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works good, a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Works good, and was easy to install. Plastic hinge feels a bit fragile. Be weary not to bump into light too hard.
customer_reviews.author: ScrapMetal

customer_reviews.title: As the description says it is a 12" light - ...
customer_reviews.text: As the description says it is a 12" light - it is not very tall but it gets the job done. Functions very well as to folding down so that it does not get in the way when jumping off of the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Good light
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality but never the less a good light !! Works fine
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C.

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: Very bright little light .. very please but was hope to find this with a taller pole ..
customer_reviews.author: Brian Skrobot

customer_reviews.title: Great Light!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install, pops up and goes down with ease. Remember that it is 12" from top of the light to the bottom of the base.
customer_reviews.author: Gill's Distro

customer_reviews.title: Meh.. sure was affordable tho.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic base plate snapped the second time I flipped it up. I bought some duct tape on amazon and taped that s#*t right up. Seems to be fine now. It lights up and keeps me legal.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for t top mount on our boat. Easy install and shines bright
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than most
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is short as my old one would not clear the ski tow bar when the top was down. This shorter one fits much better. Nice for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the boat...we hung it upside down from the top. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed one that would get out of the way when not needed
customer_reviews.author: Buckrub

customer_reviews.title: has the correct lens .
customer_reviews.text: I used this because it folds out of the way. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great but in the add it's said it was led , turns out it not !!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy l.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice light similar to the ones in WM but cheaper in price not quality.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Much shorter than the Original on on boat but is great for us
customer_reviews.author: patas

customer_reviews.title: Good stern light
customer_reviews.text: Good stern light for use with canoes, jon boats or similar light craft when night boating or anchored while fishing. Plastic splined hub allows you to position, then lock into place. Uses 1004 series bulbs, Shoreline makes a direct replacement LED bulb for this unit. For my uses I scuffed, then spray painted the shiny metal using flat BBQ black. I also use electrical tape to secure the globe in place so it doesn't come loose in transit or choppy water. I did swap the stock bulb for the LED version as it uses 1/12 the power and is plenty bright. Easy swap.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Tea

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works as designed, easy to install on my Bimini top rail where the light was originally installed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price . Easy hook up
customer_reviews.text: Good light for the price. It's short but that's what to be expected . If you want a tall light you need to buy the tall one . Provides lots of light in the back of boat. Easy flip up and down . Lots of people said it was cheap and breaks easy . If you know how to turn a knob and you're not an oger you shouldn't have any trouble .
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a replacement light
customer_reviews.text: Installed it on my pontoon boat. The base was wide enough that i could clamp it on to the bimini cover frame with 3 bolts. I removed my old light and reconnected the two wires. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: markE

customer_reviews.title: Value Navi Light
customer_reviews.text: Basic and nothing special. Be careful not to over tighten baseplate. Cheap thin plastic and will crack as mine did.
customer_reviews.author: Jason U

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, reasonable price, could have done with a bit more wire though, and for a stern light not very bright, otherwise OK.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Crane

customer_reviews.title: I ran this all last season and it worked great. It folds down easily
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on a 21' center console. I replaced my stern anchor light with this light and mounted it on my t-top. I did replace the standard bulb with an LED. I ran this all last season and it worked great. It folds down easily, which is great for when the boat gets shrink wrapped in the winter. A great light! I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JBoogy27

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive& nifty.
customer_reviews.text: Nifty light. Pulls about 1 ampere of current at 12 volts. I have it on my 1032 Starcraft jon-boat. Seems sturdy enough. I easily modified it for height and to accept a small led array for less battery drain.
customer_reviews.author: Bud K

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is & works as it should ...
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is & works as it should & the price can't be beat (trust me on this as I looked everywhere)
customer_reviews.author: psychodoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, it's a replacement for my old telescopic light.
customer_reviews.author: Bmish54

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Small profile. Not extremely bright but bright enough to see from a decent distance on the water.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy it
customer_reviews.text: worked the day I received. has not worked since. had to go to academy and buy another one
customer_reviews.author: james mathews

customer_reviews.title: It’s bright
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great. Base is plastic and has potential to break but all in all great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Shrimpdaddyllc

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality Navigation Light
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality light and much better than the one I replaced on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: easy to install bright enough to light up all the interior of our boat... extended upward it lights up the entire exterior!
customer_reviews.text: This marine light is easy to install bright enough to light up all the interior of our boat when folded down... extended upward it lights up the entire exterior- night swimming!!!
customer_reviews.author: frank bishop

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Very bright.
customer_reviews.text: Great light, would be better in a LED setup, but for the price you can't beat it. Easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: mac

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT IDEA
customer_reviews.text: GREAT !! Saw the posts where folks are whining that they break it trying to fold it. The plastic teeth are very strong. The plastic base is thick. I loosen the screw took the pole out and filed the teeth of both locking wheels. Now I can loosen the screw and fold down or put up with ease. If anything Shoreline built this to well. I have depended on Shoreline to deliver quality products in the past, I still do! If my review has helped you in anyway, please click the yes or even the no.....or is that know?
customer_reviews.author: LARRY b

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The item was as advertised, easy installation, good craftsmanship, thank you. I would recommend it to friends when asked about using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yukoner

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product
customer_reviews.text: replaced a broken one on our Southbay tritoon. This one worked great, installed quickly and is super bright!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive bright navigation light
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive navigation light for my pontoon boat. An easy replacement and the light. It was bright but I did have to redrill, but I expected that
customer_reviews.author: Ward C. Hiner

customer_reviews.title: and I love the fold down feature that protects it when not ...
customer_reviews.text: Put this on a now finished project boat, and I love the fold down feature that protects it when not in use. Very bright and you can swap out the bulb for an LED.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: pretty nice for the lowest price i could find anywhere
customer_reviews.text: pretty nice for the lowest price i could find anywhere. Plan on buying a LED light bulb to replace regular on in it now. But tough to beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Worked on my pontoon boat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a replacement and the price was right and worked just fine
customer_reviews.author: TDE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. Arrived on time and would buy from again! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Powers

customer_reviews.title: Look for a light with a better quality mount.
customer_reviews.text: The light works well but the mount is cheap. The mount broke during my first use after instillation.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Installs in seconds. Love that it folds out of the way during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice light.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy mount and the wiring was long enough to hook up to existing wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Ward

customer_reviews.title: Stern light
customer_reviews.text: very easy to install. Not sure how it works as I haven't been out at night on the water. You can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: norwich34

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price but think I'll order a ext poke this is a little shoet
customer_reviews.author: Jon Sands

product_meta.title: Shoreline Marine All-Round Fold Down Stern Light, 12-Inch
product_meta.description: The anodized aluminum pole resists the elements, and with the twist of a thumb screw the light can be lowered out of the way. Mounts on flat surface or angled windshield. 360 degree visible globe.
feature_bullets: Navigation Lights Are Required For Night Time Boating

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
